title: buff nasus E armor pen% to 45% from 35% please
body: when you guys changed the flat armor pen 40 at rank5 E to 35% armor pen at rank5 E feels kind of like a huge nerf matching against damage champs :C

replies.body: The shred on his E is intended to make him more of a juggernaut that plays front to back in a teamfight and will chunk down tanks/bruisers as he wades into battle. One of Nasus's primary weaknesses is closing on his targets, so if he's on attacking damage/squishy champs that means the enemy team is likely not playing correctly against you, and that's all the buff you need. Giving him almost 50% armor shred on his E would just make him good at everything, which I really don't feel he needs anymore after his changes several months ago.
what changes did he get those months ago, if you don't mind my asking? (I had about a year long hiatus)

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/nasus/

Figured I'd just copy the link to the patch notes :) Those changes resulted in ~2.5-3% WR spike skewed towards high MMR and some spot pro play.

thanks. :D

Oh wow I'm actually trolling. I'm just going to copy past the patch note :P

Nasus is supposed to be the late-game scaling juggernaut if he plays the laning phase right and gets stacked up. In practice, he ends up mostly hitting high-armor frontliners, and losing a lot of his expected efficiency as a result. Struggling to reach priority targets who kite well is an expected weakness of Nasus, but he should still feel impactful when he’s stuck hitting beefier targets.

E - Spirit Fire
ARMOR REDUCTION 20/25/30/35/40 flat armor reduction ⇒ 15/20/25/30/35 percent armor reduction

R - Fury of the Sands
NEWSPEEDY SAND While Nasus is empowered, Siphoning Strike’s cooldown is reduced by 50%
